name: Bioparticle
description:
Guide the living particle from room to room till it reaches safety while controlling gravity in your favor. Made for the B&W Game Jam.

P - Pause
WASD/Arrows Keys - Movement
NumPad(1-9) - Set Gravity Direction

Lore: Created by accident, left in an abandoned lab full of hazards. Capable of messing with gravity in a local scale. It wonders for a better place, it searches for a less chaotic way of living.
